title: Crud Operation
description: Developed a CRUD application using the MERN stack, implementing robust functionalities for seamless data management and interactive user experiences.

title: Currency Converter
description: Developed a Currency Converter application, integrated with a currency exchange API to enable real-time conversions, featuring a user-friendly interface and accurate exchange rate calculations

title: Expense Tracker
description: Leverages Chrome's Local Storage to save expense data directly in the user's browser, ensuring data persistence without requiring a backend server.

title: Password Generator App
description: Generate random passwords of a specified length.Include/exclude uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. User-friendly interface with checkboxes for easy customization.

title: Study Abroad Landing Page
description: A visually appealing and responsive landing page designed for students interested in studying MBBS abroad. It features key benefits, top countries, a step-by-step admission process, and a lead generation form.
